article_title: Cape Girardeau doctor seeks 8th District seat
article_text:
Houston, MO (65483)

Today

Cloudy this morning with thunderstorms developing this afternoon. A few storms may be severe. High 74F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%..

Tonight

Thunderstorms early, then cloudy skies after midnight. A few storms may be severe. Low 63F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

article_metadata.author: Houston Herald • news@houstonherald.com

og.description: A Cape Girardeau doctor seeking the Republican nomination for the 8th Congressional District visited last week in Texas County.
